triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The survey discusses advances and developments in reinforcement learning, which is the foundational paradigm for the field.

triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The paper surveys deep reinforcement learning methods combined with multi-agent scenarios, which is the core focus.

triples.name: Multi-agent learning
triples.relevance: Multi-agent reinforcement learning is the primary subject of the survey, addressing problems where multiple agents interact.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: Multi-agent systems provide the framework within which multiple learning agents operate and interact.

triples.name: Cooperative game theory
triples.relevance: The survey analyzes emergent patterns in cooperative multi-agent scenarios using game theory concepts.

triples.name: Non-cooperative game theory
triples.relevance: The survey examines competitive and mixed agent scenarios, which are analyzed through non-cooperative game theory.
